author: psmith
msg: added self explanatory ShowSplashScreen application preference.

author: psmith
msg: added the MulticastReceiver to the list of the known
Receiver class, and reordered the list to be alphabetical.

author: psmith
msg: fixed a bug where closing the frame by using the standard
window close widget (the 'x' in the top right hand corner
for example) caused the main frame to disappear but
not exit if you chose to cancel the exit confirmation.

author: psmith
msg: Smartened up the logic for determing the correct editor
to display within the property editor sheet.
This was most notable when the Threshold for a particular
plugin was null, and so it thought it was a string.

author: psmith
msg: for some reason this fixes a NPE on linux...
